heading: HR01161
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION BY THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES ON THE IMMEDIATE APPROVAL OF THE SEVEN POWER SUPPLY AGREEMENTS OF MERALCO BY THE ENERGY REGULATORY COMMISSION

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01161
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION BY THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES ON THE IMMEDIATE APPROVAL OF THE SEVEN POWER SUPPLY AGREEMENTS OF MERALCO BY THE ENERGY REGULATORY COMMISSION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUAREZ, DANILO E.
DATE FILED : 2017-08-01
REMARKS: Recommending its adoption of House Resolution No. 1741, its findings and recommendations, as contained in Committee Report No. 632 submitted by the Committee on Good Government and Public Accountability and the Committee on Energy on February 27, 2018 pursuant to House Resolution No. 1161
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY ON 2017-08-15
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON ENERGY

REMARKS: Recommending adoption of findings and recommendations of House Resolution No. 1741 pursuant to House Resolution No. 1161
